SQLSatement.sql: SELECT a.BMCode, a.BMDesc, a.FunctionType, count(b.MethodID) MethodNum, a.CreateUser, CreateUser, Convert(varchar(30),CreateDate,120) CreateDate FROM dbo.BusinessMethod a LEFT JOIN BusinessMethod_InternalMethods b ON a.BMCode=b.BMCode WHERE a.DatabaseID={0} AND a.ClassifyID={1} AND (a.BMCode LIKE '{2}%' OR a.BMDesc LIKE '%{2}%' OR a.FunctionType='{2}' OR a.CreateUser='{2}') GROUP BY a.BMCode, a.BMDesc, a.FunctionType, a.CreateUser, a.CreateDate ORDER BY a.BMCode DESC
